name: Save the smoking citizen
description:
A ~1 hour long 2D Action/platformer silly game with little to no story

Oh no! Marius Axator just kidnaped a guy, you have to pummel him! (You have to pummel Marius, not the guy)

Use esc to see the control, you can change them by clicking "change control"

If you don't block cookies you should be able to stop playing then continue at your last checkpoint.
